content.raw:
I agree.  This also ties into boundary conditions: we can simply define an integration matrix which could also be used to specify integral boundary conditions, etc.   

Also, both explicit integration and the current differentiation methods should be time-tested against simple matrix multiplication using the sparse Diff (and proposed Int) matrices, for performance.
